title: Population growth in Mexico 2018
yAxis: Population growth compared to the previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Population growth compared to the previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall Population growth compared to the previous year has decreased over the Year.
Population growth compared to the previous year is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Population growth compared to the previous year, about 1.5 was reported at Year 2008
The lowest Population growth compared to the previous year, of value 1.13 was reported at Year 2018
